Package gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

Class CoreferenceSemanticGraph

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<SemanticItem,java.lang.String>, org.jgrapht.Graph<SemanticItem,java.lang.String>
    public class CoreferenceSemanticGraph
extends SemanticGraph
    This class extends document semantic graphs to accommodate coreference relations. ArgumentIdentificationWithCoreference class can use such information to enhance relation extraction.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoreferenceSemanticGraph

        public CoreferenceSemanticGraph​(Document doc)
        Constructs a document semantic graph enhanced with coreference. Simply calls the constructor of the superclass.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to associate with the graph

    • Method Detail

      • addSemanticNode

        public void addSemanticNode​(SemanticItem parent,
                            SemanticItem sem,
                            java.lang.String role)
        Description copied from class: SemanticGraph
        Adds the semantic item sem to the graph. If the parent is null, sem is only added to the graph, without linking it to any other semantic item. Otherwise, an edge is created between the parent and the sem. The id of the edge has the form role:pId:sId, where pId is the id of the parent and sId is the id of the sem.
        Overrides:
        addSemanticNode in class SemanticGraph
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent of the semantic object, can be null
        sem - the semantic object to add
        role - the relation type between the parent and the object, can be an empty string
